name: Aether: A Heroic Fantasy RPG
description:
Aether is a card based Fantasy TTRPG that combines the narrative character focus of Fate and PBTA (Powered By The Apocalypse) games with semi-tactical combat reminiscent of d20 grid based TTRPGs. Players will create Aetherborn, characters who have learned to tap the power of their own souls and go on various adventures that help them define what they consider heroic on their own terms. 

You choose everything from your character's fate, to what they value most, to what they try to hide, and then your play group will collaboratively build a setting with as much or as little detail as you want to help the Narrator (GM) give all of you a place to start. The game is built to make your character choices matter, as each Goal, Value or Destiny you set becomes your way to earn Experience to grow stronger, or earn Limit Breaks to succeed in dire moments. 

The game also includes a full suite of tools to guide new Narrators (Game Runners) get used to the flow of gameplay, planning encounters and building their own monsters to use (complete with random generators).

Included Files: 

  • 180 Page bookmarked PDF with a linked table of contents for easy navigation
  • Form-Fillable Character Sheet
  • Form-Fillable NPC statblocks
  • Form-Fillable Party and Campaign Planning sheets. 
  • My eternal gratitude.... seriously.

What You'll Need: 

A deck of 52 playing cards, the files, and a way to keep notes.
